snippet: Since enrolling in a Head Start Program at Public School 15, Jaren Aponte, who has a sensory disorder, has learned how to interact better with others.
abstract: Educational Alliance, a beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, provides funds to Mary Viera of the Bronx to buy bedroom furniture for her son, who has a sensory disorder.
lead_paragraph: Since enrolling in a Head Start Program at Public School 15, Jaren Aponte, who has a sensory disorder, has learned how to interact better with others.

headline.print_headline: A Boy Full of Quirks Learns to Curb His Aggression
